disabled.description: whether the dropdown menu is disabled

getPopupContainer.description: to set the container of the dropdown menu. The default is to create a `div` element in `body`, you can reset it to the scrolling area and make a relative reposition. example
getPopupContainer.description_zh: 菜单渲染父节点。默认渲染到 body 上，如果你遇到菜单滚动定位问题，试试修改为滚动的区域，并相对其定位。

overlayClassName.description: Class name of the dropdown root element

:overlayStyle.description: Style of the dropdown root element

placement.description: placement of pop menu: bottomLeft bottomCenter bottomRight topLeft topCenter topRight
placement.description_zh: 菜单弹出位置：bottomLeft bottomCenter bottomRight topLeft topCenter topRight

trigger.description: the trigger mode which executes the drop-down action, hover doesn't work on mobile device
trigger.description_zh: 触发下拉的行为, 移动端不支持 hover

v-model.description: whether the dropdown menu is visible

events.name: visibleChange
events.description: a callback function takes an argument: visible, is executed when the visible state is changed
events.description_zh: 菜单显示状态改变时调用，参数为 visible
